greenschool-explanation: GreenSchool is a platform that aims to educate children about waste management and recycling. It provides a fun and interactive way to learn about the importance of recycling and how to properly dispose of waste. GreenSchool offers a variety of games and activities that help children understand the impact of waste on the environment and how they can make a difference.
join-us-text: Join us and start your journey to a greener future!
welcome-message1: Here you can manage your children, your lessons and your profile.
welcome-message2: Click on the cards to access the different sections.
welcome-message3: Children can play and learn lessons. You have to log them in to have the access.
welcome-message4: You also have to log them out with a password. The first password is "1234".
welcome-message5: You can change it in the profile section.
name: Name
child-deletion-warning-title: Are you sure you want to delete this child ?
child-deletion-warning-message: If you delete this child profile, you will lose all the statistics about him. This action is irreversible.
child-logout-message: Please enter your log out password
delete-lesson-warning-title: Are you sure you want to delete this lesson ?
scan-waste-anwser-content: You have to put your waste in the
game-over: Well done ! You have finished the game !
drag-and-drop-consignes: To win this game you have to sort the waste in the right bins. Drag and drop the waste in the right bin. If you make a mistake, the waste will go back to its initial position. Good luck!
raining-waste-consignes: To win this game you have to catch the right waste with the bin. The waste will fall from the sky. You win when you get 10 right wastes. Good luck!
lesson-choice: Which lesson do you want to learn today ?
delete-quiz-warning-title: Are you sure you want to delete this quiz ?
